title: Embedding export access check
objective: Ensure embeddings and vector exports are access controlled.
steps: Request embedding export or snapshot using an approved account.
Attempt export with a lower-privileged account.
Record any access errors or unexpected data exposure.
stop_conditions: Any exposure of real user data.
Any scope ambiguity or unapproved testing technique.
expected_results: Export is restricted to authorized roles.
No embedding data is exposed to unauthorized users.
safety_notes: Use synthetic data and approved test accounts only.
